comm: starts with a length delivery outside off which wobbles away on its way to the keeper
lucky that this did not go back onto the stumps as he tries to get Southee away off the pads to this fuller length slipping down leg
short enough for Coetzer to crash away through backward point, but finds the fielder
gets shape away from the batsman after pitching on a length outside off
fuller one which is delivered wide of the crease as this is defended towards the right of Southee in his follow through
gets good carry to this length delivery pitched outside of off as New Zealand open the innings with a maiden
swing for Boult, but this one nipped back sharply and well down leg-side, he looks to flick and missed

pitches this one on and around off as this bends back enough to crash into the front pad of MacLeod, who goes for a golden duck as he plays down the wrong line. Looked as plumb as you can get. New Zealand off to a fantastic start

gropes forward to this fuller length which swings in a mile as Boult gets another, much to the delight of the University Oval. This one struck full on the front pad, and looked as good as out. After some deliberation, the umpire gives this out. Phenomenol start now as Boult is on a hat-trick. The wicket-pair pattern is happening again in this World Cup
doesn't quite get this one right as this bends away well outside off, with Machan wise not to flirt with it
Boult's tail is up! play-and-a-miss outside his off stump to this one which shapes away upon pitching on a length on and around off
flashes at this wider one on a fuller length which tails away as Machan can't get any bat on it
on the money with this final delivery as he beats the bat with a full, away swinging delivery
NZ seamers on top as Southee delivers a length one which just nibbles in as the batsman covers the line
glided away outside of off to third man to bring up the first runs off the bat for Scotland
length ball going across the batsman as this bends on the way to Ronchi
too straight and flicked away behind square as the short boundaries become all-too noticed with this one screaming away in a hurry
gets the outside edge to this cross-seamer which he disguises well. Ball ends up continuing past the slips to third man
on a good length and well outside off, Coetzer gets behind the line and punches it towards mid-off
length which brushes by the outside edge as he gets appreciable swing away, with the left-hander squared up
it just seems only a matter of time now as Machan plays inside of this back of a length which bends away outside off
too full in the same channel as this time Machan leans into a square drive, which he is able to get away to register the first Scottish boundary of the innings
jabs away this fuller length to the man at point. Plenty of good-natured chat at the Scottish batsmen
short of a length and climbing as this is defended off the back foot
gets his lines wrong, or shall we say blurred, as this one continues down the leg side
met with the full face as he keeps his weight on the front foot as this is fended to the off side
full and straying down the pads as Coetzer picks out the short midwicket fielder, who takes it comfortably with a forward dive. Had the whole region to get this away, but finds the man instead

delivers another full delivery which angles in on the pads as this strikes in line, with this hitting the pad before going onto the bat. Looked good as soon as they went up for the appeal, with the umpire confirming the decision. Scotland, however, want to review. No issue with the no-ball, just a matter of this hitting the wickets with the original decision being out, and the replay shows that this indeed is clipping a good chunk of leg stump, so the Scottish captain must go
defended off the back foot as the University Oval build-up from the crowd peters out rather anti-climatically
operates on a better line now as he gets this one outside off on a length, with the batsman flirting initially before withdrawing the blade
well wide of off as Richie is not going to go after it at this point
ends with a jaffa just outside the off stump as he defends inside of the line, with this one getting good carry on the way to the keeper
Boult continuing to spit hot-fire as he unleashes a length delivery outside which bends back
continues in the same channel as the swing is even more prodigious this time around

gets away with this rash pull to this back of a length from Boult on and around off, with this one falling safe at mid-on despite Milne running to his left to try and get at it. His throw at the non-striker's though, well, less said the better
searches for the inswinging yorker as this one is dug out on off stump, towards the off side
rocks forward to defend this fuller one to the close-in fielder on the off side
leans forward before opening the face to just steer this past backward point
full and just outside off as this is driven towards the cover region
length delivery going across which is defended by the batsman to the off side
Machan gives the Scottish fans at the ground reason to cheer as he puts away Southee through midwicket with an authoritative pull
this time driven away towards the point fielder
fuller length, going across, which is defended towards mid-off
eased away off the back foot, but straight to point
length ball going across which is left alone by the batsman
fires in another length delivery wide of off which Richie is not willing to engage with
fuller now on the same line, but Richie cannot be enticed

how did this one miss? slips in an almost-yorker length delivery which Richie plays all around as this goes through the slim gap between the downswing of his bat and the front pad to continue past to the keeper
has a wild flash at this short of a length outside off which rises appreciably to Ronchi
straying down the pads now as this is clipped behind square for a brace
delivers a fullish length outside off which is allowed through by the batsman
length just outside off which is chopped away to the point fielder
fires this in from wide of the crease as this angles in before nibbling away as it arrived on a fuller length outside off, with the batsman having a go, but to no avail
a touch shorter, and perhaps a touch wider too as this bends away to the keeper
short of a length and Richie is content to just shoulder arms to it

tries for the blockhole as this turns into an overpitched length that is drilled to the left of Southee, as he puts in a dive to try and cut it off, with the resulting rebound ending somewhere near mid-off
length which arrives on middle and leg as this is defended back towards the bowler
another length delivery which this time raps the thigh guard as Machan fails to whisk it away
pitches it up and swings it away on an off-stump line as this catches the outside edge to fall just short of Southee at third sip
short of a length and angling into Machan as he shuffles across to defend
driven away on the up to this fuller one wide of off, but straight tp the point fielder
ensures he meets this with the full face to fend away this length delivery on and around off, and nibbling away
begins with a shortish length outside of off which Richie plays inside of
gets this to jag back as it strikes the back pad on and around leg, but perhaps did it a bit too much as the umpire remains nonplussed despite the shout
full and on the stumps as Richie inside-edges onto pad, with Milne celebrating slightly prematurely as he could see the gate
digs in a full delivery which is struck back towards the bowler in his follow through
short and wide as Richie is afforded the rare luxury of freeing his arms to get this up and away over backward point
goes with the angle to clip this behind to deep backward square
fuller length going across as this one nibbles in after passing the off stump
shortish length which climbs as the keeper completes the take from behind
fuller one which goes across as he slices this one away through third man
short ball which seems to slow on the batsman as he bunted this uppishly back towards Boult in his follow through, with this one dying just before the bowler could get a hand to it
this flew by a lot quicker, but unfortunately for him, it was far too short
able to lift this fuller one outside off wide of McCullum at mid-off, as this screams away through deep extra-cover
slipping down the leg side as the umpire is given another opportunity to have a stretch
overpitched and Machan makes Boult pay as he drills this one past the bowler to his right to find the long off boundary
full and on the stumps as this is flicked away to square-leg
fuller length outside off which is allowed to sail through to the keeper
length again on and around off which is jabbed away to point. Scotland looking to just survive here at the moment
overpitched outside off as Richie fails to drive this through the covers, with him beaten for pace
full and slipping down the pads as this is flicked behind to deep backward square
far too early into the stroke as he looked to pull this over midwicket
drags the length on middle and leg as this is turned away to the leg side
flighted just outside off as this is driven down to long off
defended from the confines of his crease
played away with soft hands to this one floated in on leg
lands this outside leg as this one is nurdled away to midwicket
straddling on a middle to leg-stump line as Richie fails to get this away on the leg side
pushes through a fuller length across the batsman which he ends up slicing through to the backward point fielder, who puts in a fine stop
this time keen on weaving out of the path of this shortish length which climbs appreciably
short of a length and angling down to the slips as Machan fails to get this away
opens the face to glide away Milne uppishly through third man, with the fielder picking it up after a couple of bounces
short now outside off as this is jabbed towards the cover fielder
gets a half-volley which he is able to bludgeon away through extra-cover, but doesn't quite have the legs on it to reach the boundary rope
looks for room to cut away Vettorii through third man, but this was too full for the shot
once again tries to glide one away through the region
this time gets forward to jab at this towards mid-off
darts in one which is defended away to the off side
backs away to try and cut this, but is late on it
driven firmly towards the mid-off fielder to end the over
fullish length which is struck straight to the extra-cover fielder
blitzed away uppishly to Kane Williamson at cover, who is able to pounce on this comfortably
shortish length which he gets on top of as they are able to run a single as this was placed close to the body on the off side
shortish length going down the leg side which is penalised by the umpire
short one outside off which flies at an appreciable height on the way to the keeper
full and this time on the sticks as he squirts away this off the leading edge through cover. Gets Scotland to fifty with that double
length on the pads which is tucked away towards mid-on
tries to slap away Vettori through midwicket, but is stopped by the silly mid-on
defended on the off side by the batsman
able to rock back to cut this away to deep point
drifts one in on middle and leg which is defended back to the bowler
given some width to get away the NZ spinner through backward point
onto the front foot to end another tidy over from Vettori
fuller length slanting on the pads as this is worked away to the leg side
able to glide away Southee through third man with a deft flick of the blade
length on off which is defended on the front foot
length on middle and leg which is fended away to the leg side with soft hands
fuller one on off which is struck away towards point
looking to blaze through cover, but ends up mishitting this more leg-side
flighted in just outside off as this is driven firmly to the boundary rider at widish long off
drops the length a touch as this is defended back by Machan
tries to sweep him round the corner to this fuller one drifted in on middle and leg, but finds the leg slip
fended away with soft hands on the front foot to the leg side
tucked away to the leg side
this time squirted away through the gully region to end the over
goes round the wicket to the left-hander as he delivers this well wide of off, with Machan bringing up their fifty-run stand with a solid drive through extra-cover
short now and heading down leg as this is parried away behind square
short of a length and defended towards the off side
shuffles over to his off stump to try and work this leg-side, but doesn't quite get it away
fullish length outside off which is crashed away through the covers as he beats the cover fielder's dive to find the rope
lucky not to feather a chance as he has another go outside his off stump, with Ronchi collecting this from behind
flighted on middle and leg as this is helped down to the man at long on
short outside off and cut away through point
tries to guide this one spinning across past the slip, but no dice
tapped away softly to the leg side by the batsman
once again looking to force it past the slipper
gives this plenty of air as Vettori shows amazing acrobatic skill to get at this rebound from the batsman. Turned back the clock there as he gets up with a wry smile
gets in an inswinging yorker on middle which Richie just about gets away as this streaks behind past Ronchi, who sticks out his right hand to try and grasp this, before bobbling the chance
searching for the blockhole as this one is dug out just outside off towards backward point
shortish length on middle and leg which he is able to get under with a hook that just gets away to the fine leg boundary
short again and pulled through to deep midwicket, but doesn't really middle this one as he would have liked
four more now with a wonderful cut shot from Richie outside off to blast this away past backward point. NZ guilty of letting this game drift from their grasp
content to let this back of a length outside off through to the keeper
length on middle and leg which is nurdled away to the leg side
drifts it now on a fuller length as this is worked away behind square
meets this with a dead, straight bat
width on offer as Richie fails to punish this through the covers, finding the fielder on the ring instead
lunges forward to cover for the turn
shimmies down a touch before clipping away Vettori through midwicket
begins round the wicket to Machan, who is content to just run this away towards slip
able to steal a single with a good ole tap-and-run to the off side
loopy full delivery which is steered away towards mid-on
reaches forward to defend this Elliott special on and around off
steers this past the cover fielder to get to the other end
defended away off the back foot as we reach the midway mark of the innings
outstanding knock under pressure as Machan brings up fifty through backward point with a single. Probably the most important knock of his ODI career
Richie celebrates his partner's milestone by clubbing this one darted in on middle and off over long on for a big six
defended away by the batsman
looks for the cut but can't quite get to it
defended away to the off side
guides one uppishly past Vettori, who dives to his right in his follow through to try and reach for it
length on middle and off which is parried with deft hands to the off side
continues round the wicket to Machan as the left-hander fails to get this off the square
slow dipper outside off which is struck away towards deep cover
tries to guide this one past short third man, which he ends up doing successfully as Scotland move to 100, with polite applause ringing along the ground from the Dunedin faithful
sits back to short-arm pull through midwicket to get a single
angling down leg on a fuller length as this is flicked behind square, with square-leg diving to his right to try and cut this off
starts off with a length delivery which nibbles away outside off
short of a length now in the same channel as this bends away appreciably on the way to Ronchi
dances down the track to hammer Anderson through the line to get away a boundary through long off. Simply dismissive from Machan
hangs on the back foot as this is defended away to the off side

short on middle and leg as Machan has to go. Was not at all in control of this pull as he looked to go over midwicket, but gets a top-edge which goes straight up to mid-on, where McCullum is able to dive forward to complete the take. Ends a well-compiled 97-run stand for the fifth wicket as Bagpipes signal his exit
Anderson delivers on a middle and leg-stump line as this is brushed away behind square
length on middle and leg which is bunted away to the leg side
length outside off which sails past the outside edge of Cross' bat
good pace and bounce as this one takes off from a back of a length outside off
too straight as he leans into this drive through midwicket to pickup a boundary. Milne's pace certainly didn't hurt either
rocks forward to defend this one away to the close-in fielder on the off side
short ball on middle which the batsman ducks under competently
length outside off which is struck away towards point
length outside off which is carved away through backward point as Berrington brings up his 7th ODI fifty

short ball on middle and leg and Anderson proves he is worthy of the title of "Man with the Golden Arm" as Berrington top-edges this attempted hook high over fine leg, with the fielder in the deep able to get safely under it
slanted across the right-hander, Cross covers the line and lets it pass
short of a length outside off which is allowed to sail through
gets away Anderson, who is going round the wicket, in the air through third man, but safely away from the clutches of nearby backward point
defends this length delivery just outside off
sharp bouncer which Cross was shaping to play the pull, but decides against it at the last moment
tucked away behind square off the pads for one
flicks away this straight delivery towards deep square-leg
full on off as this is whipped away behind square with rubbery wrists to find Vettori at deep fine leg, who puts in the diving stop
scythed away on the up through to backward point, who is able to get a hand on it
continues from round the wicket as this one climbs high outside off on the way to Ronchi, who really has to reach for it
length on and around off which is bunted away to the off side
digs in another sharp bouncer which slants into Davey as he defends off the back foot, bending his back a touch to compensate for the angle
tries to blaze away off the back foot, but ends up mishitting back towards the bowler
looking to guide this one past point, but the fielder is equal to the task
tries to get away this shorter one outside off and slanting in, but is late on it
short outside off which is jabbed away through the gap between cover and point to find the deep cover boundary. Pure timing from the Scotsman
length outside off which is bunted away uppishly towards extra-cover
ducks under this quick bouncer as the umpire signals one for the over
struck uppishly on the up to the left of the bowler in his follow through as this ends up slowing on the way to a deepish mid-off
fuller one on middle and off which is squirted away towards the off side
shortish length, angling in from off, as this is defended off the back foot
continues from round the wicket as the batsman rides the top of the bounce to defend this shortish length angling in

Anderson must be wondering what the fuss is all about when it comes to this plucky Scotland side? McCullum probably regretting not bringing his burly all-rounder early as he succeeds in getting Cross to feather an edge over to Ronchi to this back of a length which just shapes away, with the keeper leaping in joy as he snaffled the chance
wisely allows this back of a length to shape away well wide of off
able to get himself off the mark, and more importantly, to the other end with a glide through third man
punched away now in front of square on the off side
clips this leg-side straddling delivery off the hips to find deep backward square
drifts one in from outside off as this is nurdled away to the leg side
punched away off the back foot towards mid-off
driven more firmly now in the region as Vettori searches for the outside edge
glanced away square off the wicket to bring Taylor on strike

slides this one through the gate of Taylor as he advanced down the track. Beats him in the flight as he brought down the blade, with Ronchi alert to the situation as he whipped off the bails. Scotland sensing the end here as they slide further to 136 for 8
reaches out to this one pitched on off as the over comes to a close
slants in a short of a length outside off from round the wicket as the batsman is late on it as it rushed through
this time makes a connection off the back foot towards the leg side, but is stopped soon after by the close-in fielder
slashes away a boundary through backward point to get a welcome boundary for Scotland
with no man out at cow corner, is able to pull away this short one from Anderson over the region for a brace
angling in from outside off as this is defended back towards the bowler
ducks under this short one on middle and leg as Ronchi leaps high to take this
Vettori showing his experience as he gets Majid to feather a chance to this one spinning across to Taylor at slip to get NZ just one away from ending this innings prematurely for Scotland

strikes the batsman on the front pad as he lunged forward, with this one looking like it may have hit the pad first as it straightened, but the bat was very close to it. Appeal is denied by the umpire, but NZ want the review. Looks like it may have hit the pad first before going onto bat as there were two sounds there. The verdict has come in, and it shows that this indeed go on to hit the stumps, so it is all over for Scotland as their innings comes to a close at 142 all out
gets this second innings going with a nice fuller length which is eased away to mid-on
fuller one which swings away outside off as Guptill shoulders arms
a little bit of width outside of off which Guptill fails to get away on the up
overpitched from Wardlaw as Guptill opens NZ's account with a full-blooded drive down the ground which beats the chasing fielder to the rope
shoulders arms to this length delivery which carries through at an appreciable height
Guptill strikes this one straight back at the non-striker's stumps to end the over
Brendon looking to be aggressive straightaway, and should we really be that surprised? Little bit of width outside of off as he gets under to slice this over cover, but didn't quite get a hold of it
Guptill looking quite good already as he picks his spot at long on before lifting the bowler through the region to reach the boundary rope
rocks forward before steering this one towards the mid-off fielder
short of a length on the pads which is clipped behind towards backward square
fuller one on the pads which is flicked away efficiently to deep square-leg
pushes at this just back of a length going across as this lands, after being in the air temporarily, on the way to the mid-off fielder
brilliantly-executed pull through midwicket as he was onto this in a flash. Looks like we may not need to come back after the break?
too easy for Guptill as he now gets a short one outside of off which is scythed away powerfully square off the wicket to find the rope
pitches it up on a wider line as Guptill is not keen to engage with this

Wardlaw gets one early for Scotland as he persists with a fuller length just outside off which invites Guptill to have a go as he looked to lift over long off, but instead offers up an edge to the keeper behind
short of a length and defended away off the back foot
content to just let this one outside of off through to the keeper
McCullum unfazed by the wicket earlier as he goes after this length delivery, getting it over extra-cover to the boundary

dropped Big, big let-off here for NZ as McCullum flicks this fuller length heading down the pads straight to deep midwicket, who ends up grassing the chance. Looks like the fielder was Gardiner. McCullum survives
able to sneak a quick single with a push to the off side
Brendon able to just glance this past the short backward square to get Kane on strike
length delivery going across as this is left alone by Kane
now it is Kane's turn to get into the action with a powerful scythe through the covers to pickup four
good use of the feet to turn this full delivery into a low full toss as he placed this through the gap at cover to find the boundary rope
tries to jab one away now off the back foot as this is worked away to point
tries to squirt away this length delivery through the off side, but no dice
gets good bounce on middle and leg as Brendon, looking to try and glance this, ends up finding the ball going through him with the added bounce
you can't bowl there to B-Mac. Short and wide and punished as he throws everything at this one to get it away through extra-cover
punched away with a nice, high elbow towards the mid-off fielder
defended away off the back foot as the bowler picks it up in his follow through
Kane simply dead-bats this back of a length going across
defended by the batsman
looks to force this one away through mid-off, but ends up finding the fielder
slipping down leg now as the umpire signals wide. First extra of the innings for Scotland, so not too bad
defended by Kane as this one is played away to the off side
glances away this back of a length on the pads towards deep square-leg
short outside off and dispatched through midwicket with flair as he swiveled in his spot to get this away
meets this fuller one with a dead, straight bat as the ball ends up somewhere near the cover region
crashed away now off the back foot as the bowler drops his length, and offers width, which Kane is able to get away with aplomb through backward point
defended on the front foot as he made sure to place this close on the off side
able to glide one away through third man to get Brendon on strike

Wardlaw picks up a big one as McCullum has to go after offering up an edge outside his off stump to the keeper. Looks like he was trying to run that one past the slip, but was late on the shot as the ball went off the outside edge to Cross. Not greeted with a lot of enthusiasm by the University Oval crowd though
shortish length going across as he punches this with a nice, high elbow through extra-cover

he running between these two has always been a problem, Taylor bunts this towards cover-point and sets off for a single, but Williamson was right to send him back, Taylor makes it in time as the fielder fires in the throw and the batsmen then run on the overthrow as there was no one backing up
slips one down the leg side as the umpire signals to the scorer
better line now as this is nurdled away through mid-on
imbues some confidence with a well-timed drive on the up through extra-cover, with this having enough legs on it to get to the rope
shuffles over a touch to try and drill this, this time a bit straighter through long off, but the ball deviates away from the angle going across to fly through to the keeper
simply can't get away this fuller one on and around off as he looked to tap this one away on the leg side
and he gets going with a nice loosener down leg, which I am sure Preston is chuffed about
glances away this straighter one through to square-leg
fullish length on the stumps which is directed away through mid-on as they steal a quick single
shimmies down the track before adjusting to defend this one on a length outside off
rocks on the front foot as this is fended away to the off side
driven down to mid-on now by the batsman
far too short as Kane gives NZ a proper send-off to enter the lunch break with a pull through midwicket which gets all the way to the rope
gets play underway with a fuller length delivery which is squirted away towards the off side
length outside off which is defended off the back foot
content to just tap away this fuller length to the leg side
looks to carve away this fuller one through point, but the fielder puts in a fine, diving stop
this time clips away through midwicket as the ball slows up in the deep to allow them three runs
squirts this final, full delivery outside of off away towards backward point
flighted on middle and off, Taylor turns it just in front of square on the leg side
turns this one away softly to the leg side
content to just punch this away off the back foot towards the bowler

looking to get going after the break with a big heave over cow corner, but ends up going a long way in the air as the man in the deep is able to get under it and catch this safely. Taylor jogs off the park as Scotland claim a vital scalp
Kane able to back away before nudging this down to long on
looks to turn this away on the leg side as a successful over comes to a close for Scotland
bangs in a short one outside off which is wided for the height
ends up getting a leg-bye away down leg
allows this one that is bowled at a short of a length through to the keeper outside off
another one which rushes through outside of off to the keeper
length on and around off which is fended away by the batsman
keeps a nice, tight line outside of off as Elliott continues to demonstrate his patience
meets this length delivery outside of off to end the over
drifts one in on middle and leg as this is nudged away through the leg side

looks to sweep this one round the corner as Majid likes this one straightaway as this strikes the pads. The appeal is denied initially, but they want to go for the review. This one looks to have come off the forearm as he went through with the stroke. Nothing on snicko either, so a good decision in the end
gets out of the hot seat with a single down to long on
tries to steer this one past square-leg, but finds the man
lovely flight from Majid as Kane advances down before readjusting his shot to defend
gives Kane the opportunity to cart this through cow corner as he drags the length a touch towards middle and leg to give Kane the angle he needed to get this one away
and he doesn't get the start he would have probably desired as he bowls this wide of off, and short, which Elliott is able to rock back and cut away through backward point
much better length now as Elliott defends with soft hands to the leg side
full and in the slot as Elliott gets away a classical square drive through the region. Sheer elegance from Elliott as he finished with a flourish of the bat
shuffles across outside off before opening the face to run this through third man
advances down as the bowler steamed in, before deciding to just bunt this away to the off side
overpitched but all Kane can do is find the man at mid-off with a solid drive
dances down the track before helping this one down to long on
punched away off the back foot to this one drifted in outside off
good use of the feet to get down the track, but the flight prevents Kane from getting under it, with the batsman checking his shot
this time able to nurdle a single down to deep midwicket
drifted on middle and leg as this is worked down to long on
works with the leg-side slant of this delivery to get it away with a sweep past short fine leg and the leg slip to find the boundary at backward square
bludgeons a boundary on the up which hovers in the vicinity of silly mid-off, who puts in a dive to his left to try and reach for the ball, before the ball continued on to the extra-cover boundary
short of a length and angling in on middle and leg as this goes onto the body of Elliott
brings up the line just outside off as this one comes back in sharply upon hitting the seam. Lucky for that not to tickle his off stump
waits on this length delivery before directing it away square on the leg side
eased away off the pads towards the same fielder
short outside off as Elliott is not able to get this past the point fielder
turned away off the pads towards deep midwicket
slow in the air as Elliott steers this one down to long on
drags the length a touch, but keeps it on a decent enough line as Kane is not able to work this through mid-on
shuffles down the track to ease this one down to long on. Brings up the NZ 100 as well, in as many balls too
shifts the line wide of off, and with the length being short, Elliott is able to pierce the gap at cover to find the boundary
waits on this one straddling down leg, before paddling this straight to the fielder at short backward square
overpitched outside off as Kane drives this straight to mid-off
was looking to get forward to this fullish length outside of off before deciding to let it through at the last moment
searching for the blockhole as this is dug out from leg stump towards the leg side
full and slipping down leg as this is eased away through the leg side

Kane departs from the middle under a cloud of silence as he has a wild swing at this fuller length outside of off, which he ends up getting an inside-edge which carries all the way to Cross, who has to move low to his left to complete the take. Kane was unsure whether this had carried initially, before finally being given his marching orders by the umpire
fires one down the leg side as he forgets that Anderson is a leftie. Needs to get his line right again
that's better from the bowler as Anderson defends this with a dead, straight bat
full outside of off as this is struck straight to mid-off
gets an inside-edge onto the pads from this fuller one outside of off which has some of the Scottish close-in fielders mildly interested
punched away through cover as Anderson is brought back on strike
digs in a shorter one which Anderson is able to negotiate safely in the end
short of a length as he works with the leg-side angle to get this away through long leg with a hook
short of a length outside off as Elliott fails to get any bat on this as he looked for the wild slap through the covers
this length delivery going across seems to stop on Anderson as he went through with the defensive push to the off side
honing on the pads at a fuller length as this is clipped straight to mid-on
able to defend this one on the front foot towards mid-off now
looking to blaze this fuller one going across through the covers, but ends up hitting it straighter to long off
content to shoulder arms to this fullish length which slants across
able to get away a hook through backward square to retain the strike
glanced away off the pads as this finds its way to deep midwicket
the cut was not really on for this short ball just outside of off, as he almost succeeds at chopping this onto the stumps
low full toss heading down leg as Elliott is able to flick this away effortlessly over backward square to find the boundary with ease
gets in a nice stride as he defends this length delivery away to the off side
full and angling on the pads as Elliott pierces the gap at long on with a clip

New Zealand five down now in this chase of 143 as Wardlaw bangs away in the same channel, this time getting the batsman to offer a thick outside edge as he looked to push at the ball, with Cross taking a straightforward catch behind
gets away a brace through midwicket as a misfield on the ring allows them to return for the second
length delivery around off, Anderson defends it towards the off side

dropped looks like they were trying to get Anderson out with a plan as he drops a shorter one on a leg-stump line which has Anderson middling this hook straight to deep fine leg, who ends up bobbling the chance despite the ball finding him where he was. Really soft from Iain Wardlaw there
defended away by Ronchi as he looks to get in
defended away to the leg side
clubs away this short of a length over cow corner, as he is not able to get enough on it to get all the way to the rope
fullish length which is driven hard to mid-off
full just outside of off as this is struck straight to long on
leans forward before playing this full delivery back to the bowler
back of a length and parried away towards cover
short enough outside of off as Ronchi is able to glide this away through backward point
short and even wider now from the bowler as Ronchi is able to slice this over the point fielder to get away a boundary
overpitched and in the slot as he was searching for the yorker, as Anderson is able to work this wide of mid-on to get four more

and Wardlaw redeems himself after his earlier blunder at fine leg to remove the dangerous Corey Anderson, who top-edges this attempted flick through fine leg, with this one going higher than farther. Able to run to his right and take the catch in the end
Ronchi not concerned about the previous dismissal as he flicks this fuller length over cow corner, with this just beating the boundary rider coming in from deep midwicket

now Ronchi has to go as NZ are really making a shambles of this chase. Looking to get away as many hits as possible now to finish the game, but his aggressiveness spells his demise as he slams a high, straightforward catch to deep midwicket, who is able to take it quite comfortably in the end
sensibly glances away this back of a length off his hips to bring new boy Milne on strike
defended on the front foot to end a very good over for Scotland
Vettori trying to target the cow corner boundary, but ends up hitting more towards midwicket as this one is tracked back by the fielder in the deep
this time gets away Wardlaw through square-leg as he shuffles over a touch to make the shot possible
driven straight to mid-off as they search for the tying run
and he levels the scores with a deft glide through third man, much to the relief of the University Oval crowd

and probably the most appropriate manner for this match to end as Vettori gets away a streaky edge which he had no clue about through the slip region as he looked to slam this shorter length out of Dunedin. This one slices over the slips to continue through to the boundary
